## Instructor

![](img/marie.jpg){style="float:right; padding: 0 0 0 10px; width:150px; height:150px; border-radius: 50%; object-fit: cover;" fig-alt="Headshot of Marie Neubrander"}

Marie Neubrander is a second year Ph.D. student in the Department of Statistical Science at Duke University and is the instructor for this course. Marie's research is focused on developing statistical methods with various applications in political science.

You can contact her at [marie.neubrander\@duke.edu](mailto:marie.neubrander@duke.edu)) with any questions regarding this course.

*Office hours: Tuesdays 3:30 - 5:30 pm, Fridays 1 - 3 pm in Old Chem 203*
